columns.name: UpToCurrentMonth
columns.expression:
VAR current_month = MONTH(TODAY())
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[MonthNo] <= current_month, 1, 0)
RETURN
    result

measures.name: CurrentWeek
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
                FIRSTNONBLANK('pub dim_date'[Calendarweek], ""), 
                FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] = TODAY()))

measures.name: OI_Monthly_BUD_C
OI_BUD_C
measures.expression:
VAR delta_BUD = DIVIDE([OI_Monthly], [OI_Monthly_BUD_C]) - 1
RETURN
    IF(delta_BUD < -0.9, "", delta_BUD)

measures.name: OI_YTD_no_future
measures.expression:
CALCULATE([OI_YTD], ALL('pub dim_date'[Date]), 'pub dim_date'[Month] <= MONTH(TODAY())-1)

//IF(MAX('pub dim_date'[Date]) <= TODAY(), [OI_YTD], BLANK())

measures.name: OI_PY_YTD
measures.expression: CALCULATE([OI_Monthly], ALL('pub dim_date'[Date]), 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY())-1, 'pub dim_date'[Month] <= MONTH(TODAY())-1)

measures.name: OI_per_P_PY_YTD
measures.expression: DIVIDE([OI_PY_YTD], CALCULATE([Partner_count], ALL('pub dim_date'[Date]), 'pub dim_date'[Month] <= MONTH(TODAY()), 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY())-1))

measures.name: OI_per_P_test
measures.expression: CALCULATE(DISTINCTCOUNT('msr v_fc_order_income_accumulated'[project_number]), ALL('pub dim_date'[Date]), 'pub dim_date'[Month] <= MONTH(TODAY()), 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY())-1)

measures.name: OI_per_P_BUD_combined_YTD
measures.expression: IF([OI_Monthly_BUD_combined_no_future] = "", BLANK(), DIVIDE([OI_Monthly_BUD_combined_no_future], CALCULATE([Partner_count], ALL('pub dim_date'[Date]), 'pub dim_date'[Month] <= MONTH(TODAY()), 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY())-1)))

measures.name: Weighted Forecast Calculated
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
    SUM(nxtgn_shareofwallets[weighted_order_income]), 
    FILTER(
        nxtgn_opportunityregistrations, 
        AND(
            nxtgn_opportunityregistrations[statuscode] in {204030004, 204030000},
            AND(
                IF(
                    ISFILTERED('msr v_fc_order_income_accumulated'[industry_subject]),
                    nxtgn_opportunityregistrations[nxtgn_SectorSAPId.nxtgn_name] in ALLSELECTED('msr v_fc_order_income_accumulated'[industry_subject]),
                    TRUE()
                ),
                IF(
                    ISFILTERED('msr v_fc_order_income_accumulated'[function_subject]),
                    nxtgn_opportunityregistrations[nxtgn_ThemeSAPId.nxtgn_name] in ALLSELECTED('msr v_fc_order_income_accumulated'[function_subject]),
                    TRUE()
                )
            )
        )
    )
)

columns.name: TA: Target hours adj.
columns.expression: 'msr v_employee_utilization'[target_hours] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Vacation & other leave] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[training_hours]

measures.name: Utilization % CY
Utilization %_2
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, BLANK(), utilization)

measures.name: Completion rate (prod+ill vs adj.)
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[productive_hours_utilization])+SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[illness_hours]), SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Target hours adj.]))

measures.name: Completion
measures.expression:
IF(ISBLANK(VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)), 0, (VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)))

measures.name: Utilization_target_hours_formatted
measures.expression:
VAR number_decimal = DIVIDE([Utilization_target_hours], 1000)
    VAR number_whole = FIXED(number_decimal, 0)
RETURN
    number_whole & "k h"

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-4)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)
                    )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M_test
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-13)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
        MIN('pub dim_date'[Date]),
        FILTER(
            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month))
RETURN
    utilization

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_12M
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-13)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)
                    )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_txt
measures.expression: "L12M AVG: " & FORMAT('msr v_employee_utilization'[Utilization % AVG_12M], "0%") & "  |  L3M AVG: " & FORMAT('msr v_employee_utilization'[Utilization % AVG_3M], "0%")

measures.name: Utilization % LM
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = CALCULATE(DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        ),
                        'pub dim_date'[Month] = MONTH(TODAY())-1, 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY()))
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization % YTD
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = CALCULATE(DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        ),
                        'pub dim_date'[UpToCurrentMonth] = 1)
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization  Target YTD
measures.expression:
IF([Utilization Target AVG] = 0, 0, 
                                CALCULATE(([Utilization Target AVG] - [Utilization %_2]) * -1, FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'),'pub dim_date'[UpToCurrentMonth] = 1)))

measures.name: Utilization  Target LM
measures.expression:
IF([Utilization Target AVG] = 0, 0, 
                                CALCULATE(([Utilization Target AVG] - [Utilization %_2]) * -1, FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Month] = MONTH(TODAY())-1 && 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY()))))

measures.name: Completion Missing Hours
measures.expression:
VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR missing_hours = target_hours_utilization - hours_reported 
RETURN
    missing_hours

measures.name: Utilization  Target YTD old

IF([Utilization Target AVG] = 0, 0, 
                                CALCULATE(([Utilization Target AVG] - [Utilization %_2]) * -1, 'pub dim_date'[UpToCurrentMonth] = 1))

measures.name: pp PY
measures.expression:
var PY = 'msr v_employee_utilization'[Utilization % PY]

return
IF(PY > 0, 
    ROUND(('msr v_employee_utilization'[Utilization %_2] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[Utilization % PY]) *100, 0) & " pp",
    "N/A"
)

measures.name: Utilization_hours_missing %
measures.expression:
VAR missing = DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_missing],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        )
RETURN
    IF(missing <= 0, 0, missing)

measures.name: utilization_hours_acq_internal_illness %
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = DIVIDE(
	                        [utilization_hours_acq_internal_illness],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

columns.name: UpToCurrentMonth
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR current_month = MONTH(TODAY())
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year, 
                    IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[MonthNo] <= current_month,
                        1,
                        0),0)
RETURN
    result

columns.name: Last4Next4Weeks
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR firstWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())-4
    VAR lastWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())+3
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year,
                    IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] >= firstWeek, 
                        IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] <= lastWeek,
                            1,
                            0),0),0)
RETURN
    result

measures.name: CurrentWeek
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
                FIRSTNONBLANK('pub dim_date'[Calendarweek], ""), 
                FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] = TODAY()))

columns.name: TA: Target hours adj.
columns.expression: 'msr v_employee_utilization'[target_hours] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Vacation & other leave] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[training_hours]

measures.name: Utilization % CY
Utilization %_2
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Completion rate (prod+ill vs adj.)
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[productive_hours_utilization])+SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[illness_hours]), SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Target hours adj.]))

measures.name: Completion
measures.expression:
IF(ISBLANK(VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)), 0, (VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)))

measures.name: Utilization_target_hours_formatted
measures.expression:
VAR number_decimal = DIVIDE([Utilization_target_hours], 1000)
    VAR number_whole = FIXED(number_decimal, 0)
RETURN
    number_whole & "k h"

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-4)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)
                    )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M_test
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-13)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
        MIN('pub dim_date'[Date]),
        FILTER(
            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month))
RETURN
    utilization

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_12M
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-13)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)
                    )
RETURN

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_txt
measures.expression: "L12M AVG: " & FORMAT('msr v_employee_utilization'[Utilization % AVG_12M], "0%") & "  |  L3M AVG: " & FORMAT('msr v_employee_utilization'[Utilization % AVG_3M], "0%")

measures.name: Utilization % LM

	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        ),
                        'pub dim_date'[Month] = MONTH(TODAY())-1, 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY()))

columns.name: UpToCurrentMonth
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR current_month = MONTH(TODAY())
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year, 
                    IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[MonthNo] <= current_month,
                        1,
                        0),0)
RETURN
    result

columns.name: Last4Next4Weeks
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR firstWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())-4
    VAR lastWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())+3
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year,
                    IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] >= firstWeek, 
                        IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] <= lastWeek,
                            1,
                            0),0),0)
RETURN
    result

measures.name: CurrentWeek
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
                FIRSTNONBLANK('pub dim_date'[Calendarweek], ""), 
                FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] = TODAY()))

measures.name: OI_per_P_BUD_YTD
measures.expression: DIVIDE([OI_YTD_BUD_2], CALCULATE(DISTINCTCOUNT('msr v_fc_order_income_accumulated'[project_number]), ALL('pub dim_date'[Date]), 'pub dim_date'[Month] <= MONTH(TODAY()), 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY())-1))

measures.name: OI_Monthly_BUD_C
OI_Monthly_BUD_FP
OI_Monthly_BUD_IP
OI_YTD_BUD_combined_no_future
measures.expression:
var check_region = IF(calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level1]) || calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level2]) || calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level3]) , allselected()), allselected()) , allselected()), "R", "")
    var check_industry = IF(calculate(isfiltered(Dim_Industries[industry]) , allselected()), "I", "")
    var check_function = IF(calculate(isfiltered(Dim_Functions[function]) , allselected()), "F", "")
    var check_combination = check_region & check_industry & check_function
return
    IF(check_combination = "" || check_combination = "R", [OI_YTD_BUD_C_no_future_formatted], 
        IF(check_combination = "I", [OI_YTD_BUD_IP_no_future],
            IF(check_combination = "F", [OI_YTD_BUD_FP_no_future], "")))

measures.name: OI_per_P_PY_YTD
measures.expression: DIVIDE([OI_PY_YTD], CALCULATE([Partner_count], ALL('pub dim_date'[Date]), 'pub dim_date'[Month] <= MONTH(TODAY()), 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY())-1))

measures.name: OI_per_P_BUD_combined_YTD
measures.expression: IF([OI_Monthly_BUD_combined_no_future] = "", BLANK(), DIVIDE([OI_Monthly_BUD_combined_no_future], CALCULATE([Partner_count], ALL('pub dim_date'[Date]), 'pub dim_date'[Month] <= MONTH(TODAY()), 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY())-1)))

columns.name: TA: Target hours adj.
columns.expression: 'msr v_employee_utilization'[target_hours] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Vacation & other leave] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[training_hours]

measures.name: Utilization % CY
Utilization %_2
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Completion rate (prod+ill vs adj.)
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[productive_hours_utilization])+SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[illness_hours]), SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Target hours adj.]))

measures.name: Completion
measures.expression:
IF(ISBLANK(VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)), 0, (VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)))

measures.name: Utilization_target_hours_formatted
measures.expression:
VAR number_decimal = DIVIDE([Utilization_target_hours], 1000)
    VAR number_whole = FIXED(number_decimal, 0)
RETURN
    number_whole & "k h"

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-4)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)
                    )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M_test
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-13)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
        MIN('pub dim_date'[Date]),
        FILTER(
            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month))
RETURN
    utilization

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_12M
measures.expression:

    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)
                    )
RETURN

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_txt
measures.expression: "L12M AVG: " & FORMAT('msr v_employee_utilization'[Utilization % AVG_12M], "0%") & "  |  L3M AVG: " & FORMAT('msr v_employee_utilization'[Utilization % AVG_3M], "0%")

columns.name: UpToCurrentMonth
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR current_month = MONTH(TODAY())
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year, 
                    IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[MonthNo] <= current_month,
                        1,
                        0),0)
RETURN
    result

columns.name: Last4Next4Weeks
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR firstWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())-4
    VAR lastWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())+3
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year,
                    IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] >= firstWeek, 
                        IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] <= lastWeek,
                            1,
                            0),0),0)
RETURN
    result

measures.name: CurrentWeek
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
                FIRSTNONBLANK('pub dim_date'[Calendarweek], ""), 
                FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] = TODAY()))

measures.name: OI_Monthly_BUD_C
OI_Monthly_BUD_FP
OI_Monthly_BUD_IP
OI_YTD_BUD_combined_no_future
measures.expression:
var check_region = IF(calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level1]) || calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level2]) || calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level3]) , allselected()), allselected()) , allselected()), "R", "")
    var check_industry = IF(calculate(isfiltered(Dim_Industries[industry]) , allselected()), "I", "")
    var check_function = IF(calculate(isfiltered(Dim_Functions[function]) , allselected()), "F", "")
    var check_combination = check_region & check_industry & check_function
return
    IF(check_combination = "" || check_combination = "R", [OI_YTD_BUD_C_no_future_formatted], 
        IF(check_combination = "I", [OI_YTD_BUD_IP_no_future],
            IF(check_combination = "F", [OI_YTD_BUD_FP_no_future], "")))

measures.name: OI_per_P_PY_YTD

measures.name: OI_per_P_BUD_combined_YTD

columns.name: TA: Target hours adj.
columns.expression: 'msr v_employee_utilization'[target_hours] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Vacation & other leave] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[training_hours]

measures.name: Utilization % CY
Utilization %_2
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Completion rate (prod+ill vs adj.)
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[productive_hours_utilization])+SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[illness_hours]), SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Target hours adj.]))

measures.name: Completion
measures.expression:
IF(ISBLANK(VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)), 0, (VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)))

measures.name: Utilization_target_hours_formatted
measures.expression:
VAR number_decimal = DIVIDE([Utilization_target_hours], 1000)
    VAR number_whole = FIXED(number_decimal, 0)
RETURN
    number_whole & "k h"

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-4)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)
                    )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M_test
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-13)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
        MIN('pub dim_date'[Date]),
        FILTER(
            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month))
RETURN
    utilization

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_12M
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-13)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)
                    )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_txt
measures.expression: "L12M AVG: " & FORMAT('msr v_employee_utilization'[Utilization % AVG_12M], "0%") & "  |  L3M AVG: " & FORMAT('msr v_employee_utilization'[Utilization % AVG_3M], "0%")

measures.name: Utilization % LM
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = CALCULATE(DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        ),
                        'pub dim_date'[Month] = MONTH(TODAY())-1, 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY()))
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization % YTD
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = CALCULATE(DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        ),
                        'pub dim_date'[UpToCurrentMonth] = 1)
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization  Target YTD
measures.expression:
IF([Utilization Target AVG] = 0, 0, 
                                CALCULATE(([Utilization Target AVG] - [Utilization %_2]) * -1, FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'),'pub dim_date'[UpToCurrentMonth] = 1)))

measures.name: Utilization  Target LM
measures.expression:
IF([Utilization Target AVG] = 0, 0, 
                                CALCULATE(([Utilization Target AVG] - [Utilization %_2]) * -1, FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Month] = MONTH(TODAY())-1 && 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY()))))

measures.name: Completion Missing Hours
measures.expression:
VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR missing_hours = target_hours_utilization - hours_reported 
RETURN
    missing_hours

measures.name: Utilization  Target YTD old
measures.expression:
IF([Utilization Target AVG] = 0, 0, 
                                CALCULATE(([Utilization Target AVG] - [Utilization %_2]) * -1, 'pub dim_date'[UpToCurrentMonth] = 1))

columns.name: UpToCurrentMonth
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR current_month = MONTH(TODAY())
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year, 
                    IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[MonthNo] <= current_month,
                        1,
                        0),0)
RETURN
    result

columns.name: Last4Next4Weeks
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR firstWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())-4
    VAR lastWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())+3
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year,
                    IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] >= firstWeek, 
                        IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] <= lastWeek,
                            1,
                            0),0),0)
RETURN
    result

measures.name: CurrentWeek
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
                FIRSTNONBLANK('pub dim_date'[Calendarweek], ""), 
                FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] = TODAY()))

measures.name: OI_per_P_BUD_YTD
measures.expression: DIVIDE([OI_YTD_BUD_2], CALCULATE(DISTINCTCOUNT('msr v_fc_order_income_accumulated'[project_number]), ALL('pub dim_date'[Date]), 'pub dim_date'[Month] <= MONTH(TODAY()), 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY())-1))

measures.name: OI_Monthly_BUD_C
OI_Monthly_BUD_FP
OI_Monthly_BUD_IP
OI_YTD_BUD_combined_no_future
measures.expression:
var check_region = IF(calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level1]) || calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level2]) || calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level3]) , allselected()), allselected()) , allselected()), "R", "")
    var check_industry = IF(calculate(isfiltered(Dim_Industries[industry]) , allselected()), "I", "")
    var check_function = IF(calculate(isfiltered(Dim_Functions[function]) , allselected()), "F", "")
    var check_combination = check_region & check_industry & check_function
return
    IF(check_combination = "" || check_combination = "R", [OI_YTD_BUD_C_no_future_formatted], 
        IF(check_combination = "I", [OI_YTD_BUD_IP_no_future],
            IF(check_combination = "F", [OI_YTD_BUD_FP_no_future], "")))

measures.name: OI_per_P_PY_YTD
measures.expression: DIVIDE([OI_PY_YTD], CALCULATE([Partner_count], ALL('pub dim_date'[Date]), 'pub dim_date'[Month] <= MONTH(TODAY()), 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY())-1))

measures.name: OI_per_P_BUD_combined_YTD
measures.expression: IF([OI_YTD_BUD_combined_no_future] = "", BLANK(), DIVIDE([OI_YTD_BUD_combined_no_future], CALCULATE([Partner_count], ALL('pub dim_date'[Date]), 'pub dim_date'[Month] <= MONTH(TODAY()), 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY())-1)))

columns.name: TA: Target hours adj.
columns.expression: 'msr v_employee_utilization'[target_hours] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Vacation & other leave] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[training_hours]

measures.name: Utilization % CY
Utilization %_2
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Completion rate (prod+ill vs adj.)
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[productive_hours_utilization])+SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[illness_hours]), SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Target hours adj.]))

measures.name: Completion
measures.expression:
IF(ISBLANK(VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)), 0, (VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)))

measures.name: Utilization_target_hours_formatted
measures.expression:
VAR number_decimal = DIVIDE([Utilization_target_hours], 1000)
    VAR number_whole = FIXED(number_decimal, 0)
RETURN
    number_whole & "k h"

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-4)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)
                    )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M_test
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-13)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
        MIN('pub dim_date'[Date]),
        FILTER(
            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month))
RETURN
    utilization

columns.name: UpToCurrentMonth
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR current_month = MONTH(TODAY())
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year, 
                    IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[MonthNo] <= current_month,
                        1,
                        0),0)
RETURN
    result

columns.name: Last4Next4Weeks
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR firstWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())-4
    VAR lastWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())+3
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year,
                    IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] >= firstWeek, 
                        IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] <= lastWeek,
                            1,
                            0),0),0)
RETURN
    result

measures.name: CurrentWeek
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
                FIRSTNONBLANK('pub dim_date'[Calendarweek], ""), 
                FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] = TODAY()))

measures.name: OI_Monthly_BUD_C
OI_Monthly_BUD_FP
OI_Monthly_BUD_IP
OI_YTD_BUD_combined_no_future
measures.expression:
var check_region = IF(calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level1]) || calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level2]) || calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level3]) , allselected()), allselected()) , allselected()), "R", "")
    var check_industry = IF(calculate(isfiltered(Dim_Industries[industry]) , allselected()), "I", "")
    var check_function = IF(calculate(isfiltered(Dim_Functions[function]) , allselected()), "F", "")
    var check_combination = check_region & check_industry & check_function
return
    IF(check_combination = "" || check_combination = "R", [OI_YTD_BUD_C_no_future_formatted], 
        IF(check_combination = "I", [OI_YTD_BUD_IP_no_future],
            IF(check_combination = "F", [OI_YTD_BUD_FP_no_future], "")))

measures.name: OI_per_P_PY_YTD

measures.name: OI_per_P_BUD_combined_YTD
measures.expression: IF([OI_YTD_BUD_combined_no_future] = "", BLANK(), DIVIDE([OI_YTD_BUD_combined_no_future], CALCULATE([Partner_count], ALL('pub dim_date'[Date]), 'pub dim_date'[Month] <= MONTH(TODAY()), 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY())-1)))

datasets.name: Capacity & Utilization - MD, Region Head, Country Head

columns.name: TA: Target hours adj.
columns.expression: 'msr v_employee_utilization'[target_hours] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Vacation & other leave] - 'msr v_employee_utilization'[training_hours]

measures.name: Utilization % CY
Utilization %_2
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, BLANK(), utilization)

measures.name: Completion rate (prod+ill vs adj.)
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[productive_hours_utilization])+SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[illness_hours]), SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Target hours adj.]))

measures.name: Utilization_target_hours_formatted
measures.expression:
VAR number_decimal = DIVIDE([Utilization_target_hours], 1000)
    VAR number_whole = FIXED(number_decimal, 0)
RETURN
    number_whole & "k h"

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-4)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)
                    )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M_test
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-13)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
        MIN('pub dim_date'[Date]),
        FILTER(
            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month))
RETURN
    utilization

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_12M
measures.expression:

    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_txt

measures.name: Utilization  Target pp

	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        ),
                        'pub dim_date'[Month] = MONTH(TODAY())-1, 'pub dim_date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY()))

measures.name: Utilization % YTD

    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR missing_hours = target_hours_utilization - hours_reported 
RETURN
    missing_hours

var CY = 'msr v_employee_utilization'[Utilization %_2]

measures.expression:
IF(ISBLANK(VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]

    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]

columns.name: UpToCurrentMonth
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR current_month = MONTH(TODAY())
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year, 
                    IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[MonthNo] <= current_month, //temporary switched from <= to < only
                        1,
                        0),0)
RETURN
    result

columns.name: Last4Next4Weeks
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR firstWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())-4
    VAR lastWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())+3
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year,
                    IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] >= firstWeek, 
                        IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] <= lastWeek,
                            1,
                            0),0),0)
RETURN
    result

measures.name: CurrentWeek
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
                FIRSTNONBLANK('pub dim_date'[Calendarweek], ""), 
                FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] = TODAY()))

measures.name: Utilization % CY
Utilization %_2
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Completion rate (prod+ill vs adj.)
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[productive_hours_utilization])+SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[illness_hours]), SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Target hours adj.]))

measures.name: Completion
measures.expression:
IF(ISBLANK(VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)), 0, (VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)))

measures.name: Utilization_target_hours_formatted
measures.expression:
VAR number_decimal = DIVIDE([Utilization_target_hours], 1000)
    VAR number_whole = FIXED(number_decimal, 0)
RETURN
    number_whole & "k h"

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-4)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)
                    )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M_test
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-13)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
        MIN('pub dim_date'[Date]),
        FILTER(
            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month))
RETURN
    utilization

columns.name: UpToCurrentMonth
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR current_month = MONTH(TODAY())
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year, 
                    IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[MonthNo] <= current_month,
                        1,
                        0),0)
RETURN
    result

columns.name: Last4Next4Weeks
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR firstWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())-4
    VAR lastWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())+3
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year,
                    IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] >= firstWeek, 
                        IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] <= lastWeek,
                            1,
                            0),0),0)
RETURN
    result

measures.name: CurrentWeek
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
                FIRSTNONBLANK('pub dim_date'[Calendarweek], ""), 
                FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] = TODAY()))

measures.name: OI_Monthly_BUD_C
OI_Monthly_BUD_FP
OI_Monthly_BUD_IP
OI_YTD_BUD_combined_no_future
measures.expression:
var check_region = IF(calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level1]) || calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level2]) || calculate(isfiltered('pub v_ll_company_to_region'[region_reporting_level3]) , allselected()), allselected()) , allselected()), "R", "")
    var check_industry = IF(calculate(isfiltered(Dim_Industries[industry]) , allselected()), "I", "")
    var check_function = IF(calculate(isfiltered(Dim_Functions[function]) , allselected()), "F", "")
    var check_combination = check_region & check_industry & check_function
return
    IF(check_combination = "" || check_combination = "R", [OI_YTD_BUD_C_no_future_formatted], 
        IF(check_combination = "I", [OI_YTD_BUD_IP_no_future],
            IF(check_combination = "F", [OI_YTD_BUD_FP_no_future], "")))

measures.name: OI_per_P_PY_YTD

measures.name: OI_per_P_BUD_combined_YTD

measures.name: Selected Main Project
measures.expression: if(HASONEVALUE('Distinct Main Project Numbers'[Main Project Number]), min('Distinct Main Project Numbers'[Main Project Filter]),"Project Selection")

measures.name: Multiple Selected Main Projects
measures.expression:
VAR ConCat =
    CALCULATE (
        CONCATENATEX (
            VALUES ( dim_project[Main Project Filter])
            ,dim_project[Main Project Filter]
            ,",
"
        ), Filter(all(Dates),True())
    )
VAR IsItFiltered =
    IF ( or(or(ISFILTERED ( dim_project[Main Project Filter] ),ISFILTERED ( dim_project[project_client] )),ISFILTERED ( dim_project[delivery_manager] ))
    , ConCat
    , "Please select one or more projects" )

RETURN
    IsItFiltered

measures.name: PGR Total Days
measures.expression: DATEDIFF([PGR Earliest Start], [PGR Latest Finish], DAY)

measures.name: PGR Days to Status Date
measures.expression:
if([PGR Earliest Start] > [StatusDate]
    ,Blank()
    ,if([PGR Latest Finish] > [StatusDate]
        , DATEDIFF([PGR Earliest Start], [StatusDate],DAY)
        , [PGR Total Days]
      )
)

measures.name: PGR Remaining Days
measures.expression: [PGR Total Days] - [PGR Days to Status Date]

measures.name: PGR Progress by Status Date
measures.expression: DIVIDE([PGR Days to Status Date], [PGR Total Days], 0)

measures.name: Linear Planned Days to Status
PGR Progess by Actuals vs Planned by Status Date
measures.expression: DIVIDE([PGR Actual Days To Status Date] , [Linear Planned Days to Status], 0)

measures.name: PGR Actual Days To Date
PGR Days to Date
measures.expression:
if([PGR Earliest Start] > [Max stat date]
    ,Blank()
    ,if([PGR Latest Finish] > [Max stat date]
        , DATEDIFF([PGR Earliest Start], [Max stat date],DAY)
        , [PGR Total Days]
      )
)

measures.name: PGR Progress by Date
measures.expression: if(max(Dates[Date])>[PGR Latest Finish],blank(), DIVIDE([PGR Days to Date], [PGR Total Days], 0) )

measures.name: Linear Planned Days to Date
measures.expression: if(max(Dates[Date])> [PGR Latest Finish],blank(), [PGR Progress by Date] * [Planned Days])

measures.name: AvgActualsPerDay
measures.expression:
if([Total Actuals (date independent)] > 0
    , DIVIDE([Total Actuals (date independent)] , DATEDIFF([firstActualDate by date], [lastActualDate by date],DAY), Blank())
    , [LinearPlannedPerDay])

measures.name: PGR Actual Days To Status Date
measures.expression: CALCULATE([Actual Days], Filter(all(Dates[Date]), Dates[Date]<= [StatusDate] && Dates[Date] <= max(Dates[Date])))

measures.name: PGR Progess by Actuals vs Planned by Status Date (valid dates)
measures.expression: if(max(Dates[Date])> [lastActualDate by date],blank(), [PGR Progess by Actuals vs Planned by Status Date] )

measures.name: Goal 100%
measures.expression: if(or( max(Dates[Date])> [lastActualDate by date], max(Dates[Date])<[PGR Earliest Start]) ,blank(), 1)

measures.name: linear Forecast until planned project end
lastActualDate by date
measures.expression:
var _max = calculate(max(fact_project_time_recording[day_of_work]), All(Dates[Date]))
return if(_max < TODAY(), TODAY(),  _max)

measures.name: Forecast Result
measures.expression:
if(min(dim_project[project_status]) = "Closed"
    , [Total Actuals (date independent)]
    , CALCULATE([linear Forecast until planned project end], Filter(All(Dates[Date]),Dates[Date] =[PGR Latest Finish]))
     )

measures.name: Max of Status or Finish Date
PGR Actual Days To Last Actual
measures.expression:
if(min(Dates[Date])> [lastActualDate by date], blank(), 
     CALCULATE([Actual Days], Filter(all(Dates[Date]), Dates[Date]<= [StatusDate] && Dates[Date] <= max(Dates[Date]))))

measures.name: Forecast Result (trend)
measures.expression:
if(min(Dates[Date]) <  [lastActualDate by date]
    , [PGR Actual Days To Date]
    , if(min(Dates[Date])> [PGR Latest Finish], blank(), 
    CALCULATE([linear Forecast until planned project end], Filter(All(Dates[Date]),Dates[Date] <= max(Dates[Date])))
     ))

measures.name: Planned Days (in project duration)
measures.expression: if(or(max(Dates[Date]) < [PGR Earliest Start] ,min(Dates[Date]) > [PGR Latest Finish]), blank(), [Planned Days])

measures.name: Difference
measures.expression:
//f([Planned Days] == blank(), blank(), [Planned Days] - [Actual Days])
[Planned Days] - [Actual Days]

measures.name: Selected Main Project
measures.expression: if(HASONEVALUE('Distinct Main Project Numbers'[Main Project Number]), min('Distinct Main Project Numbers'[Main Project Filter]),"Project Selection")

measures.name: Multiple Selected Main Projects
measures.expression:
VAR ConCat =
    CALCULATE (
        CONCATENATEX (
            VALUES ( dim_project[Main Project Filter])
            ,dim_project[Main Project Filter]
            ,",
"
        ), Filter(all(Dates),True())
    )
VAR IsItFiltered =
    IF ( or(or(ISFILTERED ( dim_project[Main Project Filter] ),ISFILTERED ( dim_project[project_client] )),ISFILTERED ( dim_project[delivery_manager] ))
    , ConCat
    , "Please select one or more projects" )

RETURN
    IsItFiltered

"))
    ,"[optionally filter by selecting one or more clients]")

"))

measures.name: PGR Total Days
measures.expression: DATEDIFF([PGR Earliest Start], [PGR Latest Finish], DAY)

measures.name: PGR Days to Status Date
measures.expression:
if([PGR Earliest Start] > [StatusDate]
    ,Blank()
    ,if([PGR Latest Finish] > [StatusDate]
        , DATEDIFF([PGR Earliest Start], [StatusDate],DAY)
        , [PGR Total Days]
      )
)

measures.name: PGR Remaining Days
measures.expression: [PGR Total Days] - [PGR Days to Status Date]

measures.name: PGR Progress by Status Date
measures.expression: DIVIDE([PGR Days to Status Date], [PGR Total Days], 0)

measures.name: Linear Planned Days to Status
PGR Progess by Actuals vs Planned by Status Date
measures.expression: DIVIDE([PGR Actual Days To Status Date] , [Linear Planned Days to Status], 0)

measures.name: PGR Actual Days To Date
PGR Days to Date
measures.expression:
if([PGR Earliest Start] > [Max stat date]
    ,Blank()
    ,if([PGR Latest Finish] > [Max stat date]
        , DATEDIFF([PGR Earliest Start], [Max stat date],DAY)
        , [PGR Total Days]
      )
)

measures.name: PGR Progress by Date
measures.expression: if(max(Dates[Date])>[PGR Latest Finish],blank(), DIVIDE([PGR Days to Date], [PGR Total Days], 0) )

measures.name: Linear Planned Days to Date
measures.expression: if(max(Dates[Date])> [PGR Latest Finish],blank(), [PGR Progress by Date] * [Planned Days])

measures.name: AvgActualsPerDay
measures.expression:
if([Total Actuals (date independent)] > 0
    , DIVIDE([Total Actuals (date independent)] , DATEDIFF([firstActualDate by date], [lastActualDate by date],DAY), Blank())
    , [LinearPlannedPerDay])

measures.name: PGR Actual Days To Status Date
measures.expression: CALCULATE([Actual Days], Filter(all(Dates[Date]), Dates[Date]<= [StatusDate] && Dates[Date] <= max(Dates[Date])))

measures.name: PGR Progess by Actuals vs Planned by Status Date (valid dates)
measures.expression: if(max(Dates[Date])> [lastActualDate by date],blank(), [PGR Progess by Actuals vs Planned by Status Date] )

measures.name: Goal 100%
measures.expression: if(or( max(Dates[Date])> [lastActualDate by date], max(Dates[Date])<[PGR Earliest Start]) ,blank(), 1)

measures.name: linear Forecast until planned project end
lastActualDate by date
measures.expression:
var _max = calculate(max(fact_project_time_recording[day_of_work]), All(Dates[Date]))
return if(_max < TODAY(), TODAY(),  _max)

measures.name: Forecast Result
measures.expression:
if(min(dim_project[project_status]) = "Closed"
    , [Total Actuals (date independent)]
    , CALCULATE([linear Forecast until planned project end], Filter(All(Dates[Date]),Dates[Date] =[PGR Latest Finish]))
     )

measures.name: Max of Status or Finish Date
PGR Actual Days To Last Actual
measures.expression:
if(min(Dates[Date])> [lastActualDate by date], blank(), 
     CALCULATE([Actual Days], Filter(all(Dates[Date]), Dates[Date]<= [StatusDate] && Dates[Date] <= max(Dates[Date]))))

measures.name: Forecast Result (trend)
measures.expression:
if(min(Dates[Date]) <  [lastActualDate by date]
    , [PGR Actual Days To Date]
    , if(min(Dates[Date])> [PGR Latest Finish], blank(), 
    CALCULATE([linear Forecast until planned project end], Filter(All(Dates[Date]),Dates[Date] <= max(Dates[Date])))
     ))

measures.name: Planned Days (in project duration)
measures.expression: if(or(max(Dates[Date]) < [PGR Earliest Start] ,min(Dates[Date]) > [PGR Latest Finish]), blank(), [Planned Days])

measures.name: Difference
measures.expression:
//f([Planned Days] == blank(), blank(), [Planned Days] - [Actual Days])
[Planned Days] - [Actual Days]

measures.name: Utilization % CY
Utilization %_2
measures.expression:
VAR utilization = DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
                        )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, BLANK(), utilization)

measures.name: Completion rate (prod+ill vs adj.)
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[productive_hours_utilization])+SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[illness_hours]), SUM('msr v_employee_utilization'[TA: Target hours adj.]))

measures.name: Utilization_target_hours_formatted
measures.expression:
VAR number_decimal = DIVIDE([Utilization_target_hours], 1000)
    VAR number_whole = FIXED(number_decimal, 0)
RETURN
    number_whole & "k h"

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-4)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
                        DIVIDE(
	                        [Utilization_hours_on_client_project],
	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),
                        FILTER(
                            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month)
                    )
RETURN
    IF(utilization <= 0, 0, utilization)

measures.name: Utilization % AVG_3M_test
measures.expression:
VAR start_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-13)
    VAR end_3_month = EOMONTH(TODAY(),-1)
    VAR utilization = CALCULATE(
        MIN('pub dim_date'[Date]),
        FILTER(
            ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] > start_3_month && 'pub dim_date'[Date] <= end_3_month))
RETURN
    utilization

	                        [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]),

measures.name: Completion_OLD
measures.expression:
IF(ISBLANK(VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)), 0, (VAR hours_reported = [Utilization_hours_acq] + [Utilization_hours_internal] + [Utilization_hours_illness] + [Utilization_hours_on_client_project]
    VAR target_hours_utilization = [Utilization_target_hours_utilization]
    VAR completion_total = DIVIDE(hours_reported, target_hours_utilization) 
RETURN
    IF(completion_total < 0, 0, completion_total)))

columns.name: UpToCurrentMonth
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR current_month = MONTH(TODAY())
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year, 
                    IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[MonthNo] <= current_month, //temporary switched from <= to < only
                        1,
                        0),0)
RETURN
    result

columns.name: Last4Next4Weeks
columns.expression:
VAR current_year = YEAR(TODAY())
    VAR firstWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())-4
    VAR lastWeek = WEEKNUM(TODAY())+3
    VAR result = IF('pub dim_date'[Date].[Year] = current_year,
                    IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] >= firstWeek, 
                        IF('pub dim_date'[WeekOfYear] <= lastWeek,
                            1,
                            0),0),0)
RETURN
    result

measures.name: CurrentWeek
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
                FIRSTNONBLANK('pub dim_date'[Calendarweek], ""), 
                FILTER(ALL('pub dim_date'), 'pub dim_date'[Date] = TODAY()))
